ScrollView Class Reference

Stores all the information concerning the view and is responsible for the user interaction. More...

Detailed Description

Stores all the information concerning the view and is responsible for the user interaction.

bool clear = FALSE
) 
 

Draw initial transition.

Parameters:
t   transition to draw.

void ScrollView::updateCanvasSize (  )  [slot]
 

Updates canvas size.

Updates the size of the scroll view according to the canvas size stored in the machine

void ScrollView::zoomIn (  QPoint p = QPoint(-1,-1) )  [slot]
 

Zoom in the view at point p.

If p = (-1,-1) the middle of the view is taken.
